bookmarks.note: Fear of God, I cannot teach you. I can only teach you love of God. What is love of God? It is love of our fellow human beings. You may think this is so easy. If you think that is easy, why not try it?

Example: Noah was planting a vineyard as a symbol of ~~partnership with and~~ his trust in God. Satan perverted this symbol, instead of using it to establish a partnership with Noah at what ultimately lead to Noah's drunken stupor

Ha. Instead of asking *why* Noah was planting the vineyard, satan structured his questions in such a way as they get the answer that he wanted. He asked leading questions, to lead Noah's mind where he wanted it to go. #Lesson: depending on how you talk, you can convince people of things and explain to them what you want them to know, and get the answers that you want of them (and place the ideas that you want into their heads)

Sam’el: it's "better to reign in hell than to serve in heaven." as we're supposed to do the opposite of Satan, let's get me an allegory: if you want to be successful, it's better to be subservient to the system, a cog in the machine, than to break out of it and be your own master
Lesson: when your children triumph over you, you don't really lose. when your children triumph in general, smile

#Lesson: Be prepared. When Yochanan died, he said to move the vessels from the room [before his passing], lest they become ritually impure from contact with him. If they [his students] did this, the vessels would remain pure. Be prepared. Know what will happen, and be ready.
